subject: Re:junit-reload classes every run causing problem
msgSnippet: hi, when i try to execute the GUI of Junit automatically has reload classes every run checked and fails the test. When i uncheck and click on run it runs
messageBody:
hi,

when i try to execute the GUI of Junit automatically has "reload classes every run" checked and fails the test. When i uncheck and click on run it runs properly. What's the problem here? how can i do uncheck by default?


thanks
